title: Canadian snowmobile registrations by province 2018
summary: This is a bar chart representing Province in the x axis and Number of registrations in the y axis.
The maximum Number of registrations 201732.0 is found at Province Quebec and the minimum is found at Yukon where Province is 1805.0.
There is a difference of 199927.0 between the maximum Province Quebec and minimum Province Yukon.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of registrations for 13 number of Provinces.
Province Quebec has the highest Number of registrations and Yukon has the lowest Number of registrations.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Province in the x axis and Number of registrations in the y axis.
The maximum Number of registrations 201732.0 is found at Province Quebec and the minimum is found at Yukon where Province is 1805.0.
There is a difference of 199927.0 between the maximum Province Quebec and minimum Province Yukon.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of registrations for 13 number of Provinces.
Province Quebec has the highest Number of registrations and Yukon has the lowest Number of registrations.
Second maximum Number of registrations is found at Province Ontario.
The Number of registrations of Province Yukon is 111.76% smaller than the maximum value at Quebec.
The Province Quebec has the highest Number of registrations, followed by Ontario, and Alberta. Down to the Province Yukon which is the lowest.
The average Number of registrations in all 13 Provinces is 49168.92.
